host.name: SapientNitro
host.misc: Parking available on the street and in the parking lot.

speakers.title: Decentralized Databases, and the End of the Web Host
speakers.name: Paul Frazee
speakers.description: How do we synchronize user devices without using servers or central coordination? Join us for a discussion of content-addressing, secure data structures, the web of trust, and apps-development in a post-host Web.

speakers.title: npm-Registry@2.0
speakers.name: Ben Coe
speakers.description: npm has been in the process of rewriting their backend infrastructure. Ben, lead developer of the registry, will be talking to you about the motivations for the rewrite, and the approach that has been taken.

speakers.title: Module of the Month: Babel
speakers.name: Jacob Lowe
speakers.description: Module of the month is a segment that highlights one of the many npm modules that make Node.js so great. This month's module is Babel
